display_long_description:
# The Obstacle Course Game You’ve Been Waiting For!

**RUN, JUMP, PUNCH & SMASH** your way through 40+ levels and dungeons in this retro-themed VR platformer & obstacle course game. Filled with tough challenges, inventive obstacles, treasures to collect and secrets to discover.

[media]

# Easy to pickup and play.

- Play seated or standing.
- Lots of challenges. Both easy and difficult courses.
- Use your Super Punch and Ground Smash abilities.
- Breakable block types to smash as you race.
- Purchase weapons to help you destroy obstacles in your way!

[media]

# Race to the finish line!
- Compete to achieve Bronze, Silver or Gold Trophies!
- Checkpoints so you can keep going when things get tough!
- As long as you can complete each course, you can progress!

[media]

# Find potions that open doorways to the Shadow Realm. 
- Unique areas that provide difficult challenges.
- Listen for the sound of lightning to know one is nearby.
- Grab the special key hidden inside to unlock special rewards.

[media]

# Collect hidden stars & gold chests
- You can never have enough gold! Find chests filled with coins!
- Find and collect the super stars hidden in every level.

[media]

# Each world contains a hidden pipe.
- Find new ways to navigate Jump World.
- Complete dungeons to unlock new pipes.

[media]

# Costume & weapon shop.
- Dress for success with various costumes & hand colors.
- Purchase weapons to destroy obstacles in your way!

[media]

# Retro-Dungeons.
- Finish these extra missions to unlock each new world.

**RUN, JUMP, PUNCH & SMASH** your way through 40+ levels and dungeons in this retro-themed VR platformer & obstacle course game. Filled with tough challenges, inventive obstacles, treasures to collect and secrets to discover.

- Play seated or standing.
- Lots of challenges. Both easy and difficult courses.
- Use your Super Punch and Ground Smash abilities.
- Breakable block types to smash as you race.
- Purchase weapons to help you destroy obstacles in your way!
